mapper.select: select r.R_REGI_NO as "no", r.U_STU_NO as "student.no", e.E_NO as "enroll.no", e.E_ENROLLTIME as "enroll.enrollTime", e.E_ENROLLDAY as "enroll.enrollDay", e.E_ENROLLNUM as "enroll.enrollNum", j.is_passed as "subject.passed.passedName", s.J_NO as "subject.no", s.J_T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", s.J_GRADE as "subject.grade", s.J_SUBJECT_NAME as "subject.subjectName", s.J_SCORE as "subject.score", s.J_LIMIT_STU as "subject.limitStu", t.T_NO as "subject.siteCode.no", t.T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", t.T_NAME as "subject.siteCode.name", t.T_PRECODE as "subject.siteCode.preCode", u.U_PROF_NAME as "subject.professor.name", u.U_PROF_NO as "subject.professor.no" from E_ENROLLMENT e, J_IS_PASSED j, J_SUBJECT s, T_SITEMAP t, R_REGISUBJECT r, U_PROFESSOR u where e.E_J_SUBJECT_NO = s.J_NO and t.T_CODE = s.J_T_CODE and r.E_NO = e.E_NO and s.J_IS_PASSED = j.PASS_CODE and u.U_PROF_ID = s.J_SUB_PROF and r.U_STU_NO = #{stuNo} and e.E_NO = #{eNo}

SELECT S_NO as no, S_COURSENO as "subect.no", S_SUBNAME as subname, s_midtrum as midtrum, s_final as final1, s_atlen as atlen, s_project as project, s_distri as distri, s_outline as outline, s_goals as goals, s_method as method, s_profname as name, s_profemail as email, s_profphone as phone, s_book as book, S_MIDTURMST as midst, S_MIDTURMEND as midend, s_finalst as finalst, s_finalend as finalend, s_projectst as prost, s_projectend as proend, s_projectcontent as procontent, s_week1 as week1, s_week2 as week2, s_week3 as week3, s_week4 as week4, s_week5 as week5, s_week6 as week6, s_week7 as week7, s_week8 as week8, s_week9 as week9, s_week10 as week10, s_week11 as week11, s_week12 as week12, s_week13 as week13, s_week14 as week14, s_week15 as week15 from s_syllabus where S_COURSENO = #{subNo}

select r.R_REGI_NO as "no", r.U_STU_NO as "student.no", e.E_NO as "enroll.no", e.E_ENROLLTIME as "enroll.enrollTime", e.E_ENROLLDAY as "enroll.enrollDay", e.E_ENROLLNUM as "enroll.enrollNum", s.J_NO as "subject.no", s.J_IS_PASSED as "subject.passed.passedName", s.J_T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", s.J_GRADE as "subject.grade", s.J_SUBJECT_NAME as "subject.subjectName", s.J_SCORE as "subject.score", s.J_SUB_PROF as "subject.professor.name", s.J_LIMIT_STU as "subject.limitStu", t.T_NO as "subject.siteCode.no", t.T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", t.T_NAME as "subject.siteCode.name", t.T_PRECODE as "subject.siteCode.preCode" from E_ENROLLMENT e, J_SUBJECT s, T_SITEMAP t, R_REGISUBJECT r where e.E_J_SUBJECT_NO = s.J_NO and t.T_CODE = s.J_T_CODE and r.E_NO = e.E_NO

select r.R_REGI_NO as "no", r.U_STU_NO as "student.no", e.E_NO as "enroll.no", e.E_ENROLLTIME as "enroll.enrollTime", e.E_ENROLLDAY as "enroll.enrollDay", e.E_ENROLLNUM as "enroll.enrollNum", j.is_passed as "subject.passed.passedName", s.J_NO as "subject.no", s.J_T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", s.J_GRADE as "subject.grade", s.J_SUBJECT_NAME as "subject.subjectName", s.J_SCORE as "subject.score", s.J_LIMIT_STU as "subject.limitStu", t.T_NO as "subject.siteCode.no", t.T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", t.T_NAME as "subject.siteCode.name", t.T_PRECODE as "subject.siteCode.preCode", u.U_PROF_NAME as "subject.professor.name", u.U_PROF_NO as "subject.professor.no" from E_ENROLLMENT e, J_IS_PASSED j, J_SUBJECT s, T_SITEMAP t, R_REGISUBJECT r, U_PROFESSOR u where e.E_J_SUBJECT_NO = s.J_NO and t.T_CODE = s.J_T_CODE and r.E_NO = e.E_NO and s.J_IS_PASSED = j.PASS_CODE and u.U_PROF_ID = s.J_SUB_PROF and r.U_STU_NO = #{no}
